title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 31.4 - Student loan marketing association
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 31.4 - Student loan marketing association

State Regulations

Any bank or trust company is permitted to invest in and hold
shares of stock of the Student Loan Marketing Association. Any bank or trust
company is further permitted to act as underwriter for such stock, unless the

Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System determines that such stock is
not eligible for underwriting by banks under title 12 of the United States

Code. Such investment, holding, or underwriting by any bank or trust company
shall not exceed in total amount two percent of the capital stock and surplus
of such bank or trust company. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3

31.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
